text: Arau yadi tumi bismita horaa, tente (tatokai) bismiyara bisaya haiche sihamtara e'i kathah ‘ami yetiya matita parainata hama, tara pichato ami natuna jirana labha karaimane’? Ihamte'i haiche se'isakala loka yisakale nija pratipalakara lagata kupharai karaiche, arau ihamtarae'i dinita thakiba sikali, arau ihamte'i agnira adhibasi, tata sihamta sthayi ha’ba
